text: Christophe Philippe Charles (born 1951) is a Haitian poet. Born in Port-au- Prince, Charles received a philosophy degree from the University of Haiti. One of his best-known poems is Désastre (1975). ==References== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Haitian male poets Category:People from Port-au-Prince Category:20th-century Haitian poets Category:20th-century male writers
title: Christophe Charles
